heading: HB09211
0: AN ACT PROHIBITING THE IMPORTATION OF SOLID WASTE MATERIALS
status: Pending with the Committee on ECOLOGY since 2019-06-04
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB09211
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROHIBITING THE IMPORTATION OF SOLID WASTE MATERIALS
ABSTRACT : Provides for the definition of solid waste as defined in R.A. No.9003 and its IRR as follows: "Solid waste shall refer to all discarded household, commercial waste, non-hazardous institutional and industrial waste, street sweepings, construction debris, agricultural waste, and other non-hazardous/non-toxic solid waste." Penalizes any entity or person, foreigner, business entity owner/president/manager/sr. officers, or government official/employees who shall import any solid waste for use, treatment, or processing in violation of this Act with corresponding punishment and liabilities.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2019-06-04
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON ECOLOGY ON 2019-06-04
